## CommandMessageFromHost type

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

The set of known messages from the host to the watch loop.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type CommandMessageFromHost = ICancelCommandMessage | IExitCommandMessage | IRunCommandMessage | ISyncCommandMessage;
```
**References:** [ICancelCommandMessage](./operation-graph.icancelcommandmessage.md)<></>, [IExitCommandMessage](./operation-graph.iexitcommandmessage.md)<></>, [IRunCommandMessage](./operation-graph.iruncommandmessage.md)<></>, [ISyncCommandMessage](./operation-graph.isynccommandmessage.md)
